commands.msg: Gain LP or take damage to resolve one of $name's effects?
options: $gain, then excavate cards until you excavate a "$arch" card, then add that card to your hand¬source=0¬add_lp=500¬excavate_until=$arch
$take, then send 1 "$arch" card from your Deck to your GY¬search(0, 2, [0], "$arch", -1, 2, true)¬add_lp=-500
